landing.heroTitle: Find the best deals before the competition
landing.heroSubtitle: Monitor listings for iPhones, cars, real estate and more on OLX, Mercado Livre and Facebook. Get real-time alerts and be the first to close the deal.

landing.featureRealEstateDesc: Find properties below market price. Be the first to contact the seller.

landing.benefitFilters: Smart filters - Monitor by city, price range, keyword and more
landing.benefitProfit: Increase your profit - Be the first to the best deals and negotiate better
landing.benefitTrial: 7 days free - Try with no commitment. Cancel anytime
landing.benefitNoCatch: No hidden fees - Cancel from the app, no calls needed
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join hundreds of sellers already using RadarOne to find the best opportunities. 7 days free, no credit card required.
